授業目的: This course aims to train students in critical reading and thinking as well as academic writing.
到達目標: Students will learn to read and think critically and write academic essays.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第1回: Classes will be conducted face-to-face from the 1st week. For class content, please see below.
トピック.授業計画1: In this course we will discuss (including presentations) Michael Booth, Three Tigers, One Mountain (Penguin, 2020).
トピック.授業外学習2: 3 hours of reading and writing of weekly 250-word essay.

評価.教科書Required texts0: Michael Booth, "Three Tigers, One Mountain" (Penguin, 2020). Students are to purchase this textbook.
